review: Overall I think the product is fantastic and, for the hardware you're getting, the price is fantastic.  I do wish the UI was a bit more neutral in how it presents content to you. Amazon definitely wishes to steer users towards content from Amazon services, but getting to Netflix, Hulu, or whatever, is by no means a chore.Build quality is great.  Both the Fire TV itself and the remote feel extremely solid.That said,  while I understand the business case for not actively supporting or encouraging users who wish to gain root access, it's unfortunate that Amazon actively works to block it.
